channel.title: How do i connect to my host!
channel.description: how can i connect to my host cause i tried and says cant connect. i have port foward the ports and unlocked the port. but how can i connect to my host as my ip??

item.title: How do i connect to my host!
item.dc:creator: @dabaddest dabaddest
item.description:
@dabaddest wrote:

hey i can run my server and everything
and when i try and register it it says my server is offline WHEN ITS ONLINE

Read full topic
item.source: How do i connect to my host!

item.title: How do i connect to my host!
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

omg?

you got so many questions -.-

why not try and figure SOMETHING out by youself…

you’ll never be a successful coder by constantly asking people for the simplest things -.-

anyways… just click add your server or something w/e it says…

then put the information in the boxes[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2008, 09:28:21 PM[/size][hr][quote=“woofdawg23, post:7, topic:171880”][quote author=kiwon link=topic=231965.msg1985159#msg1985159 date=1199780425]
and port forward

=D
[/quote]ya wut he sed. but was odd for me is i nvr even tried portforwrding. all i did was dismantle my firewalls, and get no-ip and ppl can conemnct to my servers ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2008, 09:27:34 PM[/size][hr][quote author=dabaddest link=topic=231965.msg1985168#msg1985168 date=1199780774]
one more question please how can i get my server on the moparsape servewr list???
[/quote]just post ur servername, ur port, ur ip, and information about it.[/quote]o.o

weird x]

i can run my server without no-ip on and people can connect o.O

Read full topic
